function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High number of positive air and surface samples indicating potential contamination","Impact":"Spread of contagious disease, increased risk of infection for individuals in the environment","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous cleaning and disinfection protocols, improve ventilation systems, and enforce strict hygiene practices","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, automated cleaning robots","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Positive samples from isolation rooms indicate potential spread of the virus to other areas","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for individuals in adjacent areas, potential outbreak within the facility","Mitigation":"Isolate infected areas, limit access, and implement specialized cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Negative pressure rooms, antiviral surface coatings, air filtration systems","People":"Healthcare workers, facility management","Owner":"Infection control team, facility management"},{"Description":"Toilet identified as the most contaminated environment","Impact":"Increased risk of fecal-oral transmission and surface contamination","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation measures, promote hand hygiene, and use disinfectant wipes for high-touch surfaces","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, self-cleaning toilets, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"}]}
